General.Name: Broadex Technologies Co Ltd
General.Description: Broadex Technologies Co., Ltd. researches and develops, produces, and sells integrated optoelectronic devices in the field of optical communications in China and internationally. The company offers products which are used in the telecom market, such as PLC optical splitters, fiber optic access network optical transceiver modules for fiber-to-the-home networks, arrays for backbone and metropolitan area, network dense wavelength division multiplexing systems, waveguide grating, and adjustable optical power wavelength division multiplexer, front-haul and mid-backhaul optical transceiver modules for wireless bearer networks, MEMS adjustable optical attenuators for optical power attenuation, and optical fiber arrays in various optical devices, etc. It also offers products which are used in the data communication market, including optical transceiver modules for data center internal interconnection, active optical cables and high-speed copper cables, and CPO products, etc. Broadex Technologies Co., Ltd. was founded in 2003 and is based in Jiaxing, China.
General.Address: No. 306, Asia Pacific Road, Jiaxing, China, 314006
